item.title: Kelly Clarkson Sells Stake in Catalog to HarbourView
item.description: “My music is such a huge part of my journey. Knowing these songs will continue to be heard and discovered by new generations means everything to me,” Clarkson said of the deal.

item.title: The Furniture on Kelly Clarkson’s Vegas Residency Stage Is Now Available to Shop at Wayfair
